Description_lang: Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by $211805s1%, and extends its duration by ${$m1/10}.1 sec.

description_blz.en_US: Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Cada runa que gastas mientras dura Invierno sin remordimientos aumenta un 10% su daño y extiende su duración en 0.5 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cada Runa gasta durante Inverno Impiedoso aumenta em 10% o dano da habilidade e prolonga a duração dela em 0,5 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Jede während der Effektdauer von 'Unbarmherziger Winter' verbrauchte Rune erhöht den Schaden der Fähigkeit um 10% und verlängert die Dauer um 0,5 Sek.
description_blz.en_GB: Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Cada runa gastada durante Invierno sin remordimientos aumenta su daño un 10% y prolonga su duración 0,5 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Chaque rune dépensée pendant Hiver impitoyable augmente ses dégâts de 10% et sa durée de 0,5 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Ogni runa consumata durante Inverno Spietato ne aumenta i danni del 10% e ne estende la durata di 0,5 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Каждая руна, потраченная во время действия "Беспощадности зимы", увеличивает урон от нее на 10% и продлевает ее действие на 0,5 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 냉혹한 겨울의 지속시간 동안 소비한 룬 하나당 냉혹한 겨울의 공격력이 10%만큼, 지속시간이 0.5초만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在冷酷凜冬持續時間每耗費一個符文，就會讓它造成的傷害提高10%，並使持續時間延長0.5秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 冷酷严冬期间每消耗一个符文，就会使冷酷严冬造成的伤害提高10%，并使其持续时间延长0.5秒。
